org.xbib.elasticsearch.index.analysis.combo

Interface ReaderCloneFactory.ReaderCloner<T extends Reader>

  • Type Parameters:
    T - The base class handled.
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    CharArrayReaderCloner, ReaderClonerDefaultImpl, ReusableStringReaderCloner, StringReaderCloner
    Enclosing class:
    ReaderCloneFactory

    public static interface ReaderCloneFactory.ReaderCloner<T extends Reader>
    Interface for a utility class, able to clone the content of a Reader, possibly in an optimized way (such as gaining access to a package private field, or through reflection using AccessibleObject.setAccessible(boolean)).

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Reader giveAClone()
      Returns a new Reader.
      void init(T originalReader)
      Initialize or reinitialize the cloner with the given reader.

    • Method Detail

      • init

        void init(T originalReader)
          throws IOException
        Initialize or reinitialize the cloner with the given reader. The implementing class should have a default no arguments constructor.

        Remark: The given Reader is now controlled by this ReaderCloner, it may be closed during a call to this method, or it may be returned at first call to giveAClone().

        Throws:
        IOException
        See Also:
        giveAClone()

      • giveAClone

        Reader giveAClone()
        Returns a new Reader.

        Remark: The returned Reader should be closed. The original Reader, if not consumed by the init(java.io.Reader) method, should be returned at first call. Therefore it is important to call this method at least once, or to be prepared to face possible exceptions when closing the original Reader.
